DOC.brief_summary: The investigator plan conduct randomized trial compare efficacy intubate tracheal use Aintree intubation catheter either LMA-S I-gel supraglottic device
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Endotracheal Intubation Over Aintree Via I-gel Laryngeal Mask Airway Supreme
DOC.detailed_description: With proposal , investigator compare two different type supraglottic device . One LMA Supreme ( laryngeal mask airway ) I-gel . The study design use supraglottic airway device adjunct tracheal intubation , definitive airway . The investigator utilizing Aintree intubation catheter fiberoptic bronchoscope effort secure airway . This technique well described literature proven effective safe .
DOC.criteria: Subjects require routine endotracheal intubation general anesthesia part surgery . Age > 18 year old . Can provide informed consent . Subjects require rapid sequence induction endotracheal intubation ; i.e. , parturients , subject high risk aspirate gastric content airway . Subjects allergy Propofol egg . Subjects allergy rocuronium . Subjects history oropharyngeal laryngeal surgery , subject undergoing oropharyngeal laryngeal surgery . Subjects congenital anatomical airway anomaly . Subjects anticipate reduced functional residual capacity predict body mass index â‰¥40 . Currently enrol another research study .
